short_summary: Identification of chemical components found in containers at the Blue Water Bridge Commercial Operations.
description: One of the primary goals of the Border Services Officers (BSOs) upon examining marine cargo containers upon their arrival to our Land Border Ports of Entry (POE) is to ensure the commodities within the containers are compliant with regulations. While their focus is on the commodities within the containers, the CBSA is also concerned with the air quality within the containers and its potential impact on the health and safety of the examining BSOs. Identification and reporting of chemical components, including fumigants and solvents, found in containers for the specified term of the contract.
duration_in_months: Illicit 12 months with potential subsequent additions of one year each.

**Government Tender Announcement:**
# Testing for Fumigants and Solvents at Blue Water Bridge Commercial Operations

**Reference Number:** cb-6844-16146887
**Solicitation Number:** 1000415199
**Publication Date:** June 29, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** July 25, 2023 14:00:00
**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
**Contracting Entity:** Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA)

**Notice Description:**

The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) invites proposals for the identification of chemical components, including fumigants and solvents, in marine cargo containers at the Blue Water Bridge Commercial Operations in Point Edward, Ontario. The successful proponent will be responsible for conducting tests to identify the chemical components present in the containers.

**Contract Requirements:**

The period of the contract will be from the contract start date to March 31, 2024, inclusive. There is a possibility to extend the term of the contract by up to five (5) additional one (1) year periods.

**Contract Specifications:**

* Extermination or fumigation services (UNSPSC 72102103)
* Services d'extermination et de fumigation (UNSPSC 72102103)
* Competitive bidding (procurement method)
* Lowest Price (selection criteria)

**Submission Requirements:**

Proposals must be submitted in accordance with the instructions provided in the attached tender notice. Please refer to the attached documents for more information on the submission requirements.

**Attachments:**

The attached documents include the tender notice, which contains the instructions for proposal preparation and submission.

**Contact Information:**

For any inquiries, please contact Yuqiao Hu, Canada Border Services Agency, at [yuqiao.hu@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca](mailto:yuqiao.hu@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca).
